00022 #ifndef _HasFields_h
00023 #define _HasFields_h
00024 #include "VRTObject.h"
00025 #include "VRTMath.h"
00026 #include "Value.h"
00027 #include <sstream>
00028 #include <iostream>
00029 #include <map>
00030 #include <string>
00031 
00032 namespace vrt {
00040   class HasFields {
00041     public: virtual ~HasFields () { }
00042 
00044     public: virtual inline int32_t getFieldCount () const {
00045       return 0;
00046     }
00047 
00064     public: virtual inline string getFieldName (int32_t id) const {
00065       throw VRTException("Unknown field ID #%d", id);
00066     }
00067 
00073     public: virtual inline ValueType getFieldType (int32_t id) const {
00074       throw VRTException("Unknown field ID #%d", id);
00075     }
00076 
00084     public: virtual inline Value* getField (int32_t id)
00085                                      const __attribute__((warn_unused_result)) {
00086       throw VRTException("Unknown field ID #%d", id);
00087     }
00088 
00093     public: virtual inline void setField (int32_t id, const Value* val) {
00094       UNUSED_VARIABLE(val);
00095       throw VRTException("Unknown field ID #%d", id);
00096     }
00097 
00102     public: inline void setField (int32_t id, const Value &val) {
00103       setField(id, &val);
00104     }
00105 
00113     public: int32_t getFieldID (const string &name) const;
00114 
00177     public: Value* getFieldByName (const string &name) const
00178                                             __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00179 
00185     public: void setFieldByName (const string &name, const Value* val);
00186 
00192     public: inline void setFieldByName (const string &name, const Value &val) {
00193       setFieldByName(name, &val);
00194     }
00195   };
00196 
00200   inline bool isNull (const HasFields *val) {
00201     return isNull(checked_dynamic_cast<const VRTObject*>(val));
00202   }
00203 } END_NAMESPACE
00204 #endif /* _HasFields_h */
